page.content: We investigated the top result in our local issue survey to see what the people in Dumfries thought about the rates increase and what they would like to see the rates system changed to.The increase caused a lot of concern as you can see from our survey results. { RESULTS OF RATES SYSTEM SURVEY NO COMMENT 13% LOCAL INCOME TAX 32% POLL TAX 7% STAY THE SAME 21% LOCAL SALES TAX 14% OTHERS 13% {RESULTS OF RATES INCREASE COMMENTS {SURVEY DON'T AGREE 67% AGREE 5% DOESN'T AFFECT/BOTHER THEM 13% NO COMMENT 15%
